DOC.detailed_description: This single-center , double-blind , randomize , Phase 1 study ass safety tolerability HBV-001 D1 healthy adult subject . This upward titration two dose level HBV-001 D1 ( 10 µg 50 µg DEN1-80E ) 16 subject across two cohort . Participants cohort receive HBV-001 D1 vaccine placebo Visits 1 , 3 5 .
DOC.criteria: Males female age 18 45 . Body weight ≥ 110 pound ( 50 kg ) . Satisfactory medical condition establish medical history physical examination . Females must nonchild bear potential ( i.e. , surgically sterile ) , childbearing potential must abstinent willing employ adequate mean contraception . Positive serum test HIV , Hepatitis B surface antigen ( HBsAg ) and/or Hepatitis C antibody . Abuse drug alcohol within 12 month prior screen . Use corticosteroid immunosuppressive drug within 30 day screen ( use topical nasal corticosteroid allow ) . Any confirm suspect immunosuppressive immunodeficient condition . Receipt vaccination within 30 day prior screen . Receipt blood product within 6 month screen . Previous flavivirus vaccination ( e.g. , Japanese encephalitis yellow fever ) flavivirus vaccination plan study period . History flavivirus infection . No easy access fix mobile telephone . History reside country endemic dengue , Japanese encephalitis virus , Yellow Fever virus period > 1 year . Donation ≥ 450 mL blood within previous 12 week .
